In England, in the seven days to 23 December, there were 682,787 new confirmed cases (1,207.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 December, there were 457,304 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 49% (225,483 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 December is 10,545,584 (18,648.2 cases per 100,000 population).
